name: PORTLAND 2024
description:
FPS inspired by LSD Dream Simulator and Cruelty Squad. Fight your way through each level and explore till you find doorways with moving smiley faces

Includes: 

- 4 Weapons

- 3 Levels

- 1 NPC

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump / Double Jump

Shift - Sprint

MouseClick - Aim/Fire

Esc- Pause

R - Reload

1234 - Weapon Select

E- Interact (Only one Interactable Npc in game.)
